sys_documentation.help: Prior to ediing a transaction from legacy data, this field will contain the previously-specifdied approving official. When adding or editing a transaction, the Approving Official selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of this field.
sys_documentation.hint: Prior to ediing a transaction from legacy data, this field will contain the previously-specifdied approving official. When adding or editing a transaction, the Approving Official selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of this field.
sys_documentation.label: Approving Official
sys_documentation.name: x_561190_micro_p_0_transactions
